title: Scalable Post-Treatment for Improved Self-Assembled Monolayer Coverage in Perovskite Solar Cells
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01365D, Paper
Wei-Jia Qiu, Yun-Shan Li, Chieh-Ting Lin
Perovskite solar cells (PSCs) are rapidly emerging as a next-generation photovoltaic technology due to their tunable band gap, low-temperature processing, and high power conversion efficiency (PCE). Achieving uniform and effective...
